description:
Event: "National Potato Day" 
Chip: "Ranch"

Today marks National Potato Daya celebration of one of the world's most versatile and beloved root vegetables.

Event: Armed Forces Day (Philippines) | Chip: Adobo

Honoring the heroes of our nation on this special day, these Adobo potato chips pay tribute to the rich culinary tradition that binds Filipinos together.

Event: "The Renaissance of Food (Florence, Italy)" | Chip: "Truffle"
 "Born out of the vibrant culinary renaissance that flourished in Florence centuries ago, these Truffle chips capture the essence of Italy's prized ingredient.
